Event Schedule

When and where you need to be to celebrate the big day with us.

  • Date: July 1st, 2025
  • Location: The Venue

Ceremony

  • Time: 1:00 PM – 2:00 PM EST
  • Location: The Church
  • Description: Join us as we exchange our vows in a beautiful ceremony filled with love and happiness. Please arrive a little early to find your seats.

Cocktail Hour

  • Time: 1:00 PM – 2:00 PM EST
  • Location: The Venue Ball Room
  • Description: Enjoy refreshing drinks, delicious appetizers, and mingle with fellow guests during our cocktail hour. We can't wait to raise a glass with you!

Reception

  • Time: 1:00 PM – 2:00 PM EST
  • Location: The Venue
  • Description: It's time to celebrate! Join us for a night of dinner, dancing, and unforgettable moments. Get ready for speeches, toasts, and a fantastic party.

Dinner

  • Time: 1:00 PM – 2:00 PM EST
  • Location: The Venue Dining Room
  • Description: Savor a scrumptious dinner featuring a selection of delectable dishes. Please let us know your meal preferences in your RSVP.

Dancing and Entertainment:

  • Time: 1:00 PM – 2:00 PM EST
  • Location: The Venue
  • Description: The dance floor is open! Let's dance the night away with a mix of your favorite tunes and some surprises. Be sure to wear your dancing shoes!

Cake Cutting:

  • Time: 1:00 PM – 2:00 PM EST
  • Location: The Venue
  • Description: Join us for the sweetest moment of the evening as we cut our wedding cake and share a slice of happiness with you.

Late-Night Snacks:

  • Time: 1:00 PM – 2:00 PM EST
  • Location: The Venue
  • Description: Keep the party going with some late-night snacks to refuel and recharge for more fun.

Farewell:

  • Time: 1:00 PM – 2:00 PM EST
  • Location: The Venue
  • Description: It's time to bid farewell, but the memories we've created will last forever. Thank you for being a part of our special day!
